_source.short_desc: Go beyond vanity metrics with tools that show you what visitors did on your site and that let you engage with them before they bounce.
_source.long_desc: Go beyond web analytics vanity metrics with Lucky Orange to find the WHY behind what visitors did on your site. Learn why people bounced from specific pages, track visitor engagement from campaigns using UTM parameters, discover which fields on your web forms cause the most abandonment, and see which step in the purchase journey has the highest drop off. Go even deeper by asking visitors what they're struggling with or what's keeping them from purchasing with surveys and chat.
_source.pricing_details:
All plans include unlimited team members

Free Plan: $0 per month

Build: $18 per month

Grow: $35 per month

Expand: $70 per month

Scale: $150 per month

Enterprise: contact Lucky Orange

1 year: 20% off
_source.target_audience: Marketers, UX professionals, analysts and business owners at companies and agencies of all sizes around the world rely on Lucky Orange to help find new ways to improve their website conversion rates.

media.caption: Dynamic Heatmaps - Don?t settle for static heatmaps. Our heatmaps work on dynamic elements including drop-down menus and hover-overs. See where visitors moved their mouse, what they clicked or tapped on and how far down the page they scrolled.

Form Analytics - Detect issues with onsite forms through Form Analytics. See which fields caused the most abandonment, which fields got repeated, which fields caused visitors to hesitate and how long it took visitors to engage with each field.

Funnels - Track visitors through critical steps in the customer journey using Conversion Funnels. Build funnels based on page URLs or events. Jump into Session Recordings from a step with high drop off to see why visitors failed to convert.

Session Recordings - See what visitors did while they were on your site. Recordings are a replay of where visitors clicked and scrolled and the pages they visited. Segment recordings by filters such as page visited, UTM parameters and custom events.

Dashboard - Customize your dashboard to surface analytics that matter most to you. See when your website got the most traffic, how many visitors are live on your site now, which sources drove the most visitors to your site and more.

related_products.short_desc: Hootsuite helps you build your brand, strengthen connections with customers, and drive real business results with social media.
related_products.features: Social media is a wild place to do business. That's why thousands of brands rely on Hootsuite's tools and expertise to bring order to the chaos. Launch brilliant social campaigns, deliver 5-star social commerce experiences, and manage all your customer conversations in one place. Plus, get access to industry leading certifications, training, and coaching to help you push your results on social media further, faster.

related_products.short_desc: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful website, online store, or portfolio.
related_products.features: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful online presence. Look like an expert right from the start with award-winning templates for your website, online store, or portfolio. Customize the design to fit your personal style and professional needs. Get found in search by more people with powerful SEO tools. Learn where your website traffic is coming from, what your visitors are looking for, and how they're interacting with your content or products with in-depth Analytics tools.

related_products.short_desc: Reveal which companies are browsing your website, how they found you and what they view using Pipedrive's Web Visitors add-on.
related_products.features: With Pipedrive's Web Visitors add-on, you can reveal which organizations are looking at your website, how they found you, and what they engage with. Discover new leads and monitor existing customers on all your websites. Automatic rankings tell you which hot leads to follow up with first while insights show you which topics and content they're interested in. Add Web Visitors to any Pipedrive CRM plan to get more leads and manage deals with one software. Start your 14-day free trial.

related_products.short_desc: Semrush is a leading online visibility management software-as-a-service platform.
related_products.features:
With over 55 products, tools and add-ons across online visibility management, including tools for search, content, social media and market research, data for more than 142 countries, seamless integration with Google and task management platforms, Semrush is a critical solution for all companies who are serious about online presence.
Semrush in numbers: over 800 million unique domains monitored for 142 geo databases; over 43 trillion backlinks; 21 billion keywords; over 10 million users.

related_products.short_desc: Powerful analytics software for brands. Talk to a web analytics expert today.
related_products.features: Award winning business analytics that is a full suite of products accessible in one platform. Leverage cross channel data points to grow your business organically or implement a strong ROI driven search campaign. Once leads are delivered utilize the #1 CRM Software for SMB's for deal tracking and sales management.

related_products.short_desc: Hotjar is an industry-leading behavior analytics solution that will help you understand what's actually happening on your website.
related_products.features:
Hotjar is the #1 user feedback & behavior analytics software for Marketers, Product Managers, Analysts & UX Designers.
While your traditional web Analytics will tell you what is happening on your site, Hotjar will help you understand why it happens. Hotjar gives context to Google Analytics data with qualitative insights and answers behavioral questions, like where on a page visitors get stuck and struggle before dropping off. 
Trusted by 900,000 websites in 180+ countries.

related_products.short_desc: Agile CRM is a complete sales, marketing and service suite designed to let SMBs to sell and market like the Fortune 500.
related_products.features: Agile CRM analytics provides deep insight into customer behavior and website performance. Get actionable insights into customer lead and prospect activity taking place on your site or mobile app. Using Agile CRM analytics, analyze customer interests and web engagement patterns with activity reports, timelines and real-time alerts.

related_products.short_desc: Sisense delivers rapid, full-scale analytics on large and scattered datasets and allows for easy exploration of complex data.
related_products.features:
Sisense is the only business intelligence software that makes it easy for users to prepare, analyze and visualize complex data. Sisense provides an end-to-end solution for tackling growing data sets from multiple sources, that comes out-of-the-box with the ability to crunch terabytes of data and support thousands of users--all on a single commodity server.

Sisense has already won over the hearts of some of the worlds leading, most data-intensive companies, including eBay, Henry Schein, NASA

related_products.short_desc: All-in-one SEO suite of tools. Helps businesses to improve rankings, increase traffic, and gain visibility in search results.
related_products.features: Moz Pro is an all-in-one SEO suite of tools. It allows businesses to improve rankings, increase traffic, and gain more visibility in search results. Main features include keyword research, rank tracking, backlink analysis, and site audit. Keyword research tools allow businesses to improve their content and strategies. Businesses can uncover competitive advantages by tracking competitors through SERPs, fix technical problems with the help of Moz Pro suggestions and perform weekly site audits.

related_products.short_desc: EngageBay is a simple, affordable all-in-one marketing, sales and service CRM software to acquire, engage, nurture, close leads.
related_products.features: EngageBay is a simple, affordable, all-in-one marketing, sales and service CRM software built for small businesses and startups to acquire, engage, nurture web visitors and convert them to happy customers. Acquire leads through lead generation forms and popups, engage web visitors through beautiful landing pages, nurture them through engaging emails, and automate your marketing funnel through marketing automation - all from one easy to use platform.

related_products.short_desc: Marketing attribution software allows businesses to track the impact of every customer interaction they participate in.
related_products.features: Marketing attribution software allows businesses to track the impact of every customer interaction they participate in.

similar_products.short_desc: Product and journey analytics by user and account from Pendo. Learn why customers engage, return, and succeed.
similar_products.features: Product and journey analytics by user and account from Pendo. Learn why customers engage, return, and succeed. Empower your teams with comprehensive product analytics to inform data-driven decisions. Know which features users adopt, which they ignore, and see how they navigate your entire product portfolio. It's impossible to predict every path a user may take. Pendo codelessly tracks all usage as soon as it's installed - no tagging or instrumentation required.

similar_products.short_desc: Heap quickly surfaces friction or drop off points in multi-step digital journeys, so teams can make impactful product improvements.
similar_products.features: Heap helps digital experience owners quickly surface blind spots where users struggle or drop off in multi-step digital journeys, so that product and marketing teams know where to make the most impactful improvements to the digital product or website.

similar_products.short_desc: Smartlook is a qualitative analytics solution for websites & mobile apps with always-on recordings, heatmaps, events & funnels
similar_products.features: Smartlook is a qualitative analytics solution for web and mobile helping over 300,000 businesses of all sizes and industries answer the whys behind users actions. Why do users churn, or why arent they using that feature? Eliminate the guesswork: always-on visitor recordings and heatmaps show real user behavior, while automatic event tracking and conversion funnels reveal trends in behavior. Not just numbers and graphs, Smartlook tells you why users behave the way they do.

similar_products.short_desc: Freshpaint detects customer actions automatically on your site, then sends the data to 100s of analytics and advertising tools.
similar_products.features: To make better decisions you need customer data, but it shouldn't require engineers to code every event. Freshpaint detects clicks and actions automatically on your site, then sends the data to 100s of analytics and advertising tools using prebuilt integrations. Forgot to track an event? Freshpaint gives you answers today instead of two weeks from now by backfilling historical data from any new event. For digital health startups, Freshpaint signs BAAs and is 100% purpose-built to manage PHI.

similar_products.short_desc: FullStory helps businesses understand, measure, and perfect their digital experience across sites and apps.
similar_products.features: FullStory is a trusted Digital Experience Intelligence (DXI) platform that combines rich product analytics, robust session detail, and collaboration tools to deliver real-time insights that uncover opportunities on web and mobile experiences. FullStory's best-in-class DXI platform helps brands understand their users' digital experiences to eliminate friction and capitalize on what's successful.

similar_products.short_desc: New Relic is the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools
similar_products.features: New Relic One empowers engineers with a data-driven approach to planning, building, deploying and running software. Offering the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools, New Relic helps engineers get past the what to uncover the why. This improves uptime, reliability and efficiency to deliver exceptional customer experiences that fuel growth. Uncover the why with New Relic.

similar_products.short_desc: A digital shelf monitoring platform that empowers consumer brands to win more sales in online stores.
similar_products.features:
A digital shelf monitoring platform that empowers consumer brands to win more sales in online stores.

eStoreCheck is the only global, full-category digital shelf monitoring platform that enables consumer brands to win more sales in online stores. It provides an overview of your brand's online presence on the digital shelf, identifies gaps where you could be losing sales, and automates processes for faster results.

similar_products.short_desc: Automate your data collection from over 500 marketing and advertising platforms with Funnel. Free trial available!
similar_products.features: Stop wasting time with manual data collection and start focusing on getting better insights. Funnel integrates with over 500 marketing and advertising platforms (plus additional data sources on request) to collect, clean, and harmonize all your data and feed it to any destination you want. Pick any BI Tool, Visualization Software, or Data Warehouse on the market and we send your data there. No coding skills required, we do all the heavy lifting. Start your free trial today!

With over 55 products, tools and add-ons across online visibility management, including tools for search, content, social media and market research, data for more than 142 countries, seamless integration with Google and task management platforms, Semrush is a critical solution for all companies who are serious about online presence.
Semrush in numbers: over 800 million unique domains monitored for 142 geo databases; over 43 trillion backlinks; 21 billion keywords; over 10 million users.

similar_products.short_desc: VWO Data360 is a cloud-based customer data platform that allows companies to personalize purchase journeys, ensure data quality & more.
similar_products.features: VWO Data360 is a cloud-based customer data platform that allows companies to personalize purchase journeys, ensure data quality & more.

similar_products.short_desc: We Make B2B Sales Easier. Helping over 2,200 Sales and Marketing Teams Sell More in Less Time.
similar_products.features:
Powerful Sales Intelligence Platform

Our Platform Includes:
- Buyer Intent Data  - Identify Buyers Seeking a Solution Like Yours
- The Industry's most comprehensive B2B Contacts database.  Having trouble reaching prospects since everyone is working remote?  We can help.
- We identify visitors to your website by name - We can identify not the company but the person also.
- Email tracking for proposals and email marketing 

All-In-One platform with Unlimited Users.

similar_products.features: With Pipedrive's Web Visitors add-on, you can reveal which organizations are looking at your website, how they found you, and what they engage with. Discover new leads and monitor existing customers on all your websites. Automatic rankings tell you which hot leads to follow up with first while insights show you which topics and content they're interested in. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top AB Testing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of AB Testing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Use AB Testing software to increase your website's conversions. By split testing different versions of your web page, you can quickly learn which design elements, colors, and calls to actions have the best results. These applications help you optimize your conversion rate quickly and easily, often with very little coding needed. Related tools can also be found in Campaign Management software, Business Intelligence software, Web Analytics software, Landing Page software, Product Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Campaign Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Campaign Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Campaign Management software enables organizations to automate the tracking, delivery, reporting and analysis of marketing campaigns and promotions through the integration of customer data sources and the ability to parse the data through a broad range of analytic searches. Using this type of marketing campaign reporting allows organizations to evaluate and optimize multiple campaigns for different business sectors based on real-world analysis of their effectiveness. Campaign Management software is related to Email Marketing software, Marketing Automation software and Search Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Management software enables the forecasting, collection and tracking of sales leads. Through the use of Lead Management solutions, organizations can automate and manage their prospect database as well as share and distribute leads throughout the enterprise. Organizations can also use Lead Management tools to track the progress of leads, analyze the performance of sales staff and marketing campaigns and develop new leads from their existing customer base. Lead Management software is related to Contact Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Website Monitoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Website Monitoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Website Monitoring software provides monitoring and performance alerts of websites and web-based applications. Companies can easily monitor uptime, web performance and transaction performance as well as quickly determine the location of performance failures. Website monitoring solutions are used in nearly every industry, and most provide real time performance alerts on failures involving HTTP, DNS, TCP and transaction response time. Website Monitoring software is related to Requirements Management software, and Patch Management software.

_source.short_desc: Website optimization tools used by 300,000+ sites worldwide. Heatmaps, recordings, surveys, live chat, and more included in every plan.
_source.long_desc: Learn why your visitors aren't converting and how you can grow sales and capture leads with Lucky Orange. Installation takes a few seconds and doesn't require coding experience. With 10 tools for the price of one, Lucky Orange's suite of conversion rate optimization tools includes Dynamic Heatmaps, Session Recordings, Live Chat & Live View, Visitor Profiles, Surveys, Announcements, Form Analytics, Conversion Funnels, and a Realtime Dashboard. Get started today with a 7-day free trial.

_source.target_audience: Marketers, UX professionals, analysts and business owners at companies and agencies of all sizes around the world rely on Lucky Orange to help find new ways to improve their website conversion rates.

media.caption: Dynamic Heatmaps - Don?t settle for static heatmaps. Our heatmaps work on dynamic elements including drop-down menus and hover-overs. See where visitors moved their mouse, what they clicked or tapped on and how far down the page they scrolled.

Session Recordings - See what visitors did while they were on your site. Recordings are a replay of where visitors clicked and scrolled and the pages they visited. Segment recordings by filters such as page visited, UTM parameters and custom events.

Dashboard - Customize your dashboard to surface analytics that matter most to you. See when your website got the most traffic, how many visitors are live on your site now, which sources drove the most visitors to your site and more.

Surveys - Unlimited Surveys and responses are included at no extra cost. Choose from 4 survey types: multiple choice, rating, like/dislike or open-ended. Trigger surveys based on visit number, page visited, UTM parameters or custom segments.

Chat - Save the sale before it's lost by reaching out to people on your website through live Chat. Set auto-responses and use triggers to invite visitors to chat when they?re most likely to need help. Pair with live view to walk customers through issues.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee engagement platform that helps people be more motivated at work.
related_products.features: Motivosity is a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. With an average 95% user engagement rate, our software drives amazing results by making consistent recognition a part of your culture and making visible all the great work your team members are doing.

related_products.short_desc: Get valuable feedback or conduct research online with Jotform's customizable, mobile-friendly surveys, questionnaires, and polls.
related_products.features: Whether you need to conduct market research or obtain valuable feedback for your business, Jotform makes it easier than ever to create powerful online surveys that get answers fast. Build engaging and easy-to-fill surveys, questionnaires, polls, and more without any coding. Save responses in a collaborative spreadsheet-powered database platform, or turn them into visual reports in just one click to better analyze and present results.

related_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
related_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

related_products.short_desc: Create engaging, platform-independent and beautiful surveys. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to collect feedback.
related_products.features:
SurveyLegend is the next generation of online surveys engaging, platform-independent & beautiful. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to create mobile-friendly, gorgeous surveys.

Now you can create great-looking surveys on your PC or tablet, customize the look of your survey however you like, & display collected data with eye-catching & insightful graphics. Creating questionnaires is done simply by drag & drop, & you don't need to be a market research expert to use our tool.

related_products.short_desc: Collect more useful feedback with surveys that look and feel great. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps.
related_products.features: Get more insights and useful feedback using Typeform: over 1.5 million typeforms are submitted every single day. Why? Our forms look amazing (and are fully customizable to your brand), plus the smooth and responsive UI makes filling them in a pleasure. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps lets you send data automatically wherever you need it. Plus, it's quick and simple to make a typeform: get started with our easy form builder, and launch your survey in minutes.

related_products.short_desc: Birdeye Surveys is an easy-to-use product that turns customer feedback into revenue and is part of the Experience Marketing platform.
related_products.features:
Birdeye Surveys gives you an easy-to-use Survey Builder to build out surveys with advanced skip logic to
survey your customers, prospects, and employees. Survey Automation allows you to send out automated
survey requests, and ask for reviews [and referrals roadmap Q2] along with your survey. Set up email alerts
to notify specific locations/employees when survey responses come in. Survey Insights analyzes customer
feedback at scale using Athena, a Natural Language Processing engine.

related_products.short_desc: Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar!
related_products.features:
Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar.
Hotjar Surveys allow you to ask your site visitors an unlimited number of questions, from an unlimited number of respondents. On-site surveys appear as pop-up widgets on your webpage(s), and external link surveys appear as stand-alone pages with their own designated web address (URL). Use our pre-built templates or create your own.

related_products.short_desc: Online survey tool that lets you create unlimited surveys, distribute them and analyze the data  with ease.
related_products.features:
Zoho Survey is easy-to-use online survey and questionnaire building software. Our features are scalable to suit yourneeds, with everything essential to create surveys, distribute them, and analyze responses.Survey panels are also available, if you needdata from specific demographics.
Informed decisions are just around the corner.Learn more about Zoho Survey at https://www.zoho.com/survey/.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkTango enables companies to give their employees a voice and easily collect feedback for any purpose to support actionable insight.
similar_products.features:
The WorkTango platform creates a space for employees to have a voice and helps companies easily gather frequent feedback for any engagement, transformation, or feedback initiative. 

Using data science and natural language understanding, actionable insights from employee feedback are served in real-time to Human Resources, C-Suite executives, and people leaders. 

The results are quicker insight, better people actionable decisions, and a more aligned and engaged workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey software and no per-response fees.
similar_products.features: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey and customer feedback software that's flexible enough for each team to use it their way, while still giving IT full security control and insight. Alchemer won Fastest Implementation, Easiest Setup, and Best Meets Requirements from users at G2.com. Get the feedback you need with the most question types and no per-response fees.

similar_products.short_desc: GetFeedback is the #1-rated feedback solution for Salesforce. Seamlessly connect all of your CX surveys for actionable insight.
similar_products.features: With GetFeedback for Salesforce, you can automatically collect customer feedback at critical touchpoints in the customer journey. GetFeedback customers see a 240% increase in response rates and 7x faster implementation than other cx survey platforms.

similar_products.short_desc: Tremendous is the best platform to offer rewards and incentives to survey participants.
similar_products.features: Tremendous is the ultimate platform to maximize survey participation at a global scale. Incentivize survey takers with instant digital rewards, including gift cards, prepaid Visa? cards, cash and more. Buy, track and manage survey incentives individually and in bulk via the Tremendous platform, or automatically by integrating with our API.

similar_products.short_desc: Coach, motivate, and empower your employees to make every customer experience awesome.
similar_products.features:
Get more repeat purchases and referrals by improving your customers' experiences. Collect real-time customer feedback to motivate, engage, and coach your service providers so they can deliver exceptional customer experiences, every time. 

Discover why AskNicely is the leading Customer Experience Management solution. Learn more at asknicely.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile AI-powered platform to reshape your customer experience.
similar_products.features: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile, AI-powered platform to give every decision-maker in your organization the power to reshape your customer experience, your product, or your industry. Leveraging 20 plus years of expertise and over 55 billion responses by 6 billion respondents, Momentive is powered by real human inputs, based on proven best practices and delivers exceptional user experience. Trusted by over 98% of Fortune 500 companies.

similar_products.short_desc: HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance.
similar_products.features:
HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance, instantly and over time.

Our range of easy-to-use feedback-collecting Smileys, analytics, and reporting helps companies make informed decisions based on real-time, continuous data. Know how you're doing, what works (and what doesn't), and when and where to improve.

Additional Success services included, such as onboarding, customer support, Help Center, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile and cloud-based market research solution for businesses that helps collect, share and collaborate over research-based data.
similar_products.features: SurveyMonkey Enterprise empowers businesses to capture and act on critical feedback to drive growth and innovation at scale with advanced security and compliance features. Integrate survey feedback with your technology stack to enrich decision-making and automate workflows. SurveyMonkey's products, enterprise solutions, and integrations enable more than 335,000 organizations to deliver better customer experiences, increase employee retention, and unlock growth and innovation.

similar_products.short_desc: Uncover the hidden drivers of engagement & measure the pulse of your company culture with Leapsome?s employee engagement surveys.
similar_products.features:
With Leapsome you can run engagement surveys, pulse surveys, and collect eNPS to gather meaningful feedback and insights from employees. With the powerful survey analytics you can understand the engagement drivers that impact performance levels and employee churn so you can develop and retain your team.

Furthermore, Leapsome is an all-in-one people management platform used by CEOs and HR teams to not only drive employee engagement but also performance and learning as well.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 360 Degree Feedback software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 360 Degree Feedback tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 360 Degree Feedback software is designed to help human resource departments gather all-around information about an employee. Unlike performance assessment software, 360 Degree Feedback applications allow organizations to collect information not only from superiors but also from peers and subordinates, as well as clients. The information collected can be used either for assessment or training purposes. 360 Degree Feedback software is related to Performance Appraisal software, Survey software and Human Resource software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Experience software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Experience tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Experience software (also known as CXM or CEM) helps to collect, organize and track customer feedback. This software includes a variety of applications for collecting customer opinions to tools for converting text-based feedback into numeric information that can later be used for marketing purposes. Customer Experience software is related to Survey software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Loyalty software.

related_categories.description: Employee Recognition solutions assist with keeping employees feeling engaged and appreciated at work. This software facilitates peer recognition on corporate and team discussion boards, administration of awards and loyalty programs, as well as extensive reporting and analytics. Employee Recognition software is related to HR software and Talent Management software.

related_categories.description: Interactive Voice Response (IVR) software, allows call centers, help desks and other organizations to create menus which the caller can navigate using spoken commands or their telephone keys. IVR software is mainly used for systems that allow callers to select information or enter data without the need for assistance. IVR systems can also be used to route callers to the appropriate department within an organization, based on their answers to qualifying questions.

related_categories.description: Market Research software helps researchers effectively recruit, survey and maintain panel members and gather data. Using this software can yield consumer insight into marketing appeal, promotions effectiveness, product development, and customer service. A single interface can control all panel functions, including frequently used questions, panel invitations, questionnaire design, data gathering and export, and member database. Managers of online surveys and focus groups are common users of this type of software. Market Research software is related to Survey software.

related_categories.description: NPS software helps organizations implement campaigns to measure net promoter scores. NPS is a customer and employee satisfaction benchmark calculated using surveys. The final score can be used to gauge loyalty to the brand or organization.
